headline: Assessing Dominion Energy (D) Valuation After Major PJM Transmission Approval
summary: Why PJM’s new transmission plan matters for Dominion Energy investors PJM Interconnection’s approval of US$11.8b in baseline transmission projects, including about US$4.8b for Dominion Energy (D), puts the utility at the center of a long-term buildout tied to northern Virginia’s data center demand. See our latest analysis for Dominion Energy. At a share price of US$65.65, Dominion Energy has a 30 day share price return of 7.39% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 23.68%. This suggests...
